text: Dimitrios Drivas was a Greek swimmer best known for competing at the 1896 Summer Olympics in Athens. Drivas competed in the 100 metres freestyle for sailors event, which was for the Greek Navy only, eleven sailors entered but only three started, Drivas came last out of the three and still won a bronze medal. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Greek male swimmers Category:Swimmers at the 1896 Summer Olympics Category:19th-century sportsmen Category:Olympic swimmers of Greece Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Greece Category:Olympic bronze medalists in swimming Category:Hellenic Navy personnel Category:People from Spetses Category:Medalists at the 1896 Summer Olympics
title: Dimitrios Drivas
